meanings.definition: The process of extracting metals from their ores using high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: Pyrometallurgy involves extracting metals from rocks by heating them up.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses pyrometallurgy to separate iron from its ore.
meanings.sent3: During the pyrometallurgy class, the students accidentally melted their tools!
meanings.sent4: In the fiery world of pyrometallurgy, metals are born from the earth's embrace.
meanings.sent5: The blazing flames of pyrometallurgy transform dull rocks into shimmering treasures.

meanings.definition: The branch of metallurgy that deals with the production of metals using heat.
meanings.sent1: Pyrometallurgy is essential for creating various metals through heat processes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study pyrometallurgy to understand how to make metals in a furnace.
meanings.sent3: The pyrometallurgy department always has the warmest office in the building!
meanings.sent4: In the realm of pyrometallurgy, metals are forged in the fiery heart of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The ancient art of pyrometallurgy has shaped civilizations by turning ores into valuable resources.
